00023 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00024  * Histogramming facility for Camorra's random number generators. The class      *
00025  * performs a binning of the data in a range offset*sigma around the mean value, *
00026  * over a given number of bins. Then it writes out the bin fillings and the bin  *
00027  * weights as given by the generator to a data file, together with a gnuplot     *
00028  * script to visualise the histogram.                                            *
00029  *                                                                               *
00030  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00031 
00032 namespace Camorra
00033 {
00036 
00037     template<class T,class comp_type=std::less<T> >class histogram
00038     {
00039         public:
00040 
00041             /* Useful type definitions: */
00042 
00043             typedef T value_type;
00044             typedef comp_type comparison_type;
00045             
00047 
00048             class data_point
00049             {
00050                 public:
00051                     data_point(const value_type& val_,const value_type wght_=(value_type)1):val(val_),wght(wght_){}
00052                     value_type& value()
00053                     {
00054                         return val;
00055                     }
00056                     const value_type& value() const
00057                     {
00058                         return val;
00059                     }
00060                     value_type& weight()
00061                     {
00062                         return wght;
00063                     }
00064                     const value_type& weight() const
00065                     {
00066                         return wght;
00067                     }
00068                 private:
00069                     value_type val,wght;
00070             };
00071 
00073 
00074             static bool data_value_comp(const data_point& x1,const data_point& x2)
00075             {
00076                 return x1.value()<x2.value();
00077             }
00078             
00080 
00081             static bool data_weight_comp(const data_point& x1,const data_point& x2)
00082             {
00083                 return x1.weight()<x2.weight();
00084             }

00087 
00088             class bin
00089             {
00090                 public:
00091                     bin(const value_type& position_,std::size_t filling_=0,const value_type& wght_=(value_type)1):position(position_),filling(filling_),wght(wght_){}
00092                     value_type& pos()
00093                     {
00094                         return position;
00095                     }
00096                     const value_type& pos() const
00097                     {
00098                         return position;
00099                     }
00100                     std::size_t& value()
00101                     {
00102                         return filling;
00103                     }
00104                     const std::size_t& value() const
00105                     {
00106                         return filling;
00107                     }
00108                     value_type& weight()
00109                     {
00110                         return wght;
00111                     }
00112                     const value_type& weight() const
00113                     {
00114                         return wght;
00115                     }
00116                 private:
00117                     value_type position;
00118                     std::size_t filling;
00119                     value_type wght;
00120             };
00121 
00123 
00124             static bool bin_pos_comp(const bin& b1,const bin& b2)
00125             {
00126                 return b1.pos()<b2.pos();
00127             }
00128             
00130 
00131             static bool value_pos_comp(const value_type& x,const bin& b)
00132             {
00133                 return x<b.pos();
00134             }
00135 
00137 
00138             static bool bin_value_comp(const bin& b1,const bin& b2)
00139             {
00140                 return b1.value()<b2.value();
00141             }
00142 
00144 
00145             static bool bin_weight_comp(const bin& b1,const bin& b2)
00146             {
00147                 return b1.weight()<b2.weight();
00148             }

00150             typedef typename std::vector<data_point>::size_type data_size_type;
00151             typedef typename std::vector<data_point>::iterator data_iterator;
00152             typedef typename std::vector<data_point>::reverse_iterator reverse_data_iterator;
00153             typedef typename std::vector<data_point>::const_iterator const_data_iterator;
00154             typedef typename std::vector<data_point>::const_reverse_iterator const_reverse_data_iterator;
00155             typedef typename std::vector<bin>::size_type bin_size_type;
00156             typedef typename std::vector<bin>::iterator bin_iterator;
00157             typedef typename std::vector<bin>::reverse_iterator reverse_bin_iterator;
00158             typedef typename std::vector<bin>::const_iterator const_bin_iterator;
00159             typedef typename std::vector<bin>::const_reverse_iterator const_reverse_bin_iterator;
00160 
00165 
00166             histogram(const value_type* x,const value_type* w=NULL,std::size_t pts=1000):var(x),weight(w),N_points(0),mu(0),weight_sum(0)
00167             {
00168                 data.reserve(pts);
00169             }
00170 
00172 
00173             void store()
00174             {
00175                 if(weight==NULL)
00176                 {
00177                     data.push_back(data_point(*var));
00178                     ++weight_sum;
00179                 }
00180                 else
00181                 {
00182                     data.push_back(data_point(*var,*weight));
00183                     weight_sum+=(*weight);
00184                 }
00185                 mu+=(*var);
00186                 ++N_points;
00187             }
00188 
00193 
00194             void make(bin_size_type bns=100,const value_type& offset_left=3,const value_type& offset_right=3)
00195             {
00196                 N_bins=bns;
00197                 bins.clear();
00198                 bins.reserve(N_bins);
00199                 mu/=(N_points);
00200                 sig=0;
00201                 for(data_size_type i=0;i<N_points;++i)
00202                 {
00203                     sig+=((data[i].value()-mu)*(data[i].value()-mu));
00204                 }
00205                 sig=std::sqrt(sig/N_points);
00206                 
00207                 /* Computing minimal and maximal bin and bin size: */
00208                 
00209                 x_min=mu-std::abs(offset_left)*sig;
00210                 x_max=mu+std::abs(offset_right)*sig;
00211                 bin_size=(x_max-x_min)/N_bins;
00212 
00213                 /* Constructing the bins: */
00214 
00215                 if(weight==NULL)
00216                 {
00217                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00218                     {
00219                         bins.push_back(bin(x_min+i*bin_size));
00220                     }
00221                 }
00222                 else
00223                 {
00224                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00225                     {
00226                         bins.push_back(bin(x_min+i*bin_size,0,0));
00227                     }
00228                 }
00229 
00230                 /* Filling bins: */
00231 
00232                 if(weight==NULL)
00233                 {
00234                     for(data_size_type i=0;i<N_points;++i)
00235                     {
00236                         bin b(data[i].value());
00237                         typename std::vector<bin>::iterator it=std::lower_bound(bins.begin(),bins.end(),b,bin_pos_comp);
00238                         if(it != bins.begin() and it != bins.end())
00239                         {
00240                             ++it->value();
00241                         }
00242                     }
00243                 }
00244                 else
00245                 {
00246                     for(data_size_type i=0;i<N_points;++i)
00247                     {
00248                         bin b(data[i].value(),0,0);
00249                         typename std::vector<bin>::iterator it=std::lower_bound(bins.begin(),bins.end(),b,bin_pos_comp);
00250                         if(it != bins.begin() and it != bins.end())
00251                         {
00252                             ++it->value();
00253                             it->weight()+=data[i].weight();
00254                         }
00255                     }
00256                     value_type norm=N_points/weight_sum;
00257                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00258                     {
00259                         bins[i].weight()*=norm;
00260                     }
00261                 }
00262                 max_freq=std::max_element(bins.begin(),bins.end(),bin_value_comp)->value();
00263             }
00264 
00267 
00268             std::ostream& write(std::ostream& os) const
00269             {
00270                 if(weight==NULL)
00271                 {
00272                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00273                     {
00274                         os<<bins[i].pos()<<"\t"<<bins[i].value()<<std::endl;
00275                     }
00276                 }
00277                 else
00278                 {
00279                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00280                     {
00281                         os<<bins[i].pos()<<"\t"<<bins[i].value()<<"\t"<<bins[i].weight()<<std::endl;
00282                     }
00283                 }
00284                 return os;
00285             }
00286 
00288 
00289             plot_script* plot(const std::string& filename,const char* term=NULL) const
00290             {
00291                 plot_script* result=new plot_script(filename,(double)x_min,(double)x_max,(double)0,(double)10*(double)max_freq,term);
00292                 result->histo=true;
00293                 data_wrapper* data;
00294                 value_type bin,val,wgt;
00295                 if(weight==NULL)
00296                 {
00297 #ifdef GNUPLOTPATH
00298                     data=new data_wrapper(&bin,&val);
00299 #else
00300                     data=new data_wrapper(filename+".dat",&bin,&val);
00301 #endif
00302                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00303                     {
00304                         bin=bins[i].pos();
00305                         val=bins[i].value();
00306                         data->fill();
00307                     }
00308                     data->write();
00309                     data_stream* dstr=new data_stream(data);
00310                     dstr->title="generated";
00311                     dstr->style="histeps";
00312                     result->add_plot(dstr);
00313                 }
00314                 else
00315                 {
00316 #ifdef GNUPLOTPATH
00317                     data=new data_wrapper(&bin,&val,&wgt);
00318 #else
00319                     data=new data_wrapper(filename+".dat",&bin,&val,&wgt);
00320 #endif
00321                     for(bin_size_type i=0;i<N_bins;++i)
00322                     {
00323                         bin=bins[i].pos();
00324                         val=bins[i].value();
00325                         wgt=bins[i].weight();
00326                         data->fill();
00327                     }
00328                     data->write();
00329                     data_stream* dstr=new data_stream(data,"2");
00330                     dstr->title="generated";
00331                     dstr->style="histeps";
00332                     result->add_plot(dstr);
00333                     data_stream* wstr=new data_stream(data,"3");
00334                     wstr->title="weights";
00335                     wstr->style="histeps";
00336                     result->add_plot(wstr);
00337                 }
00338                 return result;
00339             }

00426 
00427             data_size_type count_events() const
00428             {
00429                 data_size_type sum(0);
00430                 for(const_bin_iterator it=bins.begin();it!=bins.end();++it)
00431                 {
00432                     sum+=it->value();
00433                 }
00434                 return sum;
00435             }

00440 
00441             const value_type* var;
00442 
00443             /* Weight of the stochastic variable value: */
00444

00446 
00447             /* Number of Monte Carlo points: */
00448 
00449             data_size_type N_points;
00450 
00451             /* Number of bins: */

00456

00458 
00459             /* Mean and variance and weight sum of the point set: */
00460 
00461             value_type mu,sig,weight_sum;
00462             
00463             /* Width of the bins: */
00464             
00465             value_type bin_size;
00466

00468

00470

00476
